== Description ==

Notifies the network admin that a new site has been activated.

Filter 'newblog_notify_siteadmin' to change the content of the notification email.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php newblog_notify_siteadmin( $blog_id, $deprecated ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$blog_id|int|The new site's ID.|required}}

{{Parameter|$deprecated|unknown_type|no description|optional|empty string}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||bool|}}

== Source File ==

<tt>newblog_notify_siteadmin()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/ms-functions.php}}
